Clean Slate Act of 2020
A bill to require automatic sealing of certain criminal records, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Clean Slate Act of 2020
This bill establishes a framework for sealing records related to certain federal criminal offenses.
Courts must automatically seal records related to (1) a conviction for simple possession of a controlled substance, or (2) an arrest for an offense that does not result in a conviction.
Additionally, an individual who meets certain criteria may petition to seal records related to a conviction for other nonviolent offenses.
